channel.title: Phil McColeman
channel.description: Recent news about Phil McColeman, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by Brantford Expositor
item.description:
Goodyear in Brantford discussing FedDev possibilities
Gary Goodyear, minister of state for the Federal Economic Development Agency for Southern Ontario, was in Brantford touring local businesses and meeting with business leaders to discuss the FedDev Ontario program. From left: Brant MP Phil McColeman, ...

item.title: Mentioned by Marketwire (press release)
item.description:
Minister Goodyear Visits Brantford to Discuss Future Plans for Jobs, Growth and ...
30, 2013) - The Honourable Gary Goodyear, Minister of State for the Federal Economic Development Agency for Southern Ontario (FedDev Ontario) along with Phil McColeman, Member of Parliament for Brant, was in Brantford today to discuss the role of FedDev Ontario in the region and seek input on ... "I am pleased to be here in Brantford with my colleague MP McColeman to participate in roundtable discussions to make certain we continue to create programs that help businesses and workers in this community.".

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Getting set for some economic consultations with @GaryGoodyearMP! Focused on the continued improvement of the southern Ontario economy!

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Excited to have @GaryGoodyearMP in town tomorrow for a roundtable discussion on securing jobs, growth and prosperity for Southern Ontario!
